item.title: Reading in May
item.description: Reading right now or just finished The Nine, Jeffrey Toobin https://www.jeffreytoobin.com/books/the-nine-tr Just finished reading this. synopsis: fucking hell, Scalia and Thomas are awful the Warren court was awesome RBG 4 life Evolutionary Biology of Parasites, Peter W. Price https://press.princeton.edu/titles/645.html In progress. I got this book from my undergrad advisor around 2001 or so - figured I’d give it a read. synopsis: parasites are awesome Bike Snob: Systematically & Mercilessly Realigning the World of Cycling, Christopher Koelle https://www.
